website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, well-fitting leggings that are a good value for their price.
pros: Users appreciated the low cost per pair in this 6-pack of leggings, as well as the pretty colors and excellent fit
They stand out for being good quality for the price and having a wide, comfortable waist band
cons: Occasionally users experienced runs in the leggings, and some felt certain colors were too sheer
While the waist band was praised by most, a few felt it was too wide

customer_reviews.title: Nice leggings, warm and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice . Wears well and have lasted through many washes. I do not do anything special with them so far as separation of laundry, and no fuzzies or frays from the fleece insides. I am 5'8" and about 135-140 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Moon

customer_reviews.title: Best leggings I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two packs of these for winter. Best, most comfy leggings I have ever owned. Fleece lining is wonderful. Great colors, amazing price. Super stretchy, very comfy. Great for people not a size 0 who don't want the tops to roll down or be squeezed like a sausage . Great l9ng length, not "high water" level.
customer_reviews.author: DenverMom46

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy leggings
customer_reviews.text: I’m a leggings queen and these are the best! Super soft and helps control the tummy area (if you need that like i do 🤣) I am 5’8 and they are long enough, which is also hard for me to find being on the taller side. They are warm but not suffocating and i love all the colors you get. 2 black pairs which you can never have enough of in my opinion. Will def be buying more ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Good leggings!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these leggings! They are soft and the fleece lining keep my legs warm. They fit really good, they are not tight but not loose they stretch to fit perfectly. I have washed them a couple of times now and have no problems, they come out looking the same and still fit good everytime. Glad I bought these, would recommend to anyone who wants some comfortable leggings.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: These fit me really well and are not see through on myself. I am currently in a size 6-8 in bottoms, and they fit just right. They’re definitely high rise. They come up above my belly button, which I don’t typically like, but they’re so light weight on my belly that it doesn’t really bother me. They’re warm but not super thick like I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Warm, high-waisted, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm skeptical about one-size items, but these fit me just fine even though I'm 5'10. They're plenty long and come up past my belly button. Very comfortable. I've washed some of them once and hang drying seems to protect against pilling so far. Be careful not to let anything sharp near them, though--a rough edge of my phone case snagged the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jo

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Great leggings. These are so soft and comfortable that I would wear them everywhere if I could. The colors are great. I ordered the regular size that states it fits sizes small to large. It does. I wear a size 12 jeans in name brands. Fits perfectly. I can’t wait for the weather to turn cool enough to wear these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. She is very fond of leggings and like to wear them in daily use. As it says in the description, these leggings are fleece from inside and very cozy. Color is bright and fits perfectly. No issues in shape even after multiple wash. I see people have complains about pilling but no issues of pilling after wash. Just use cold water for wash and it will be fine. Great for all weather. Best part is high waist, which my wife loves!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and One Size Fits All Didn't Ruin it For Me
customer_reviews.text: I love these fleece tights!! Pros: - Very soft - comfortable wide waistband that doesn't dig in - opaque "Cons" - So this isn't really a con per say but more of a caveat. I am 5'4", around 175lbs, and teeter between a size 14 and 16. That being said, these tights are "one size fits all" which I'm usually very skeptical of. They are bordering on a little loose for me. I kept them because I find tight tights really uncomfortable. These fit me great and I think they would also fit someone up to a few sizes bigger than me. Though, I think they may be too big (and therefore fall down) on someone much smaller than me.
customer_reviews.author: StarWarsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good length but pill quickly
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the midwest and it is COLD so fleece leggings are an awesome addition to my wardrobe. I'm 5'8" so often length is an issue. These are long enough to fit me and the highwaist is flattering without being bulky. My big issue is only that they pilled very quickly trying to shave off pills on 6 pairs of full length leggings is more work than is worth it for $3.00 leggings. If pilling doesn't bother you def a worthwhile purchase! I'll probably buy another pack and attempt no dryer to see if that decreases the pilling in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality that I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived very promptly, but the leggings, although fleece lined are very thin. There were strings hanging from seams, and one pair already had a snag. Worst of all, for me, was that this product was clearly meant for a large woman, although the write-up said one size fits all. I am 5 foot tall with an average size build. The wide waist has to be pulled up to my chest, and I will have to cut off the legs and resew them. The fabric is not very strong elastic, so the legs flop around instead of being tight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jindrich

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but wears down easily
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, fits well for someone like me with wide calves, and keeps my legs warm during the cold winter days! Unfortunately, it's already showing signs of pilling around the butt after a single day of use (walking, driving, sitting on kitchen chairs and couches). I'm very disappointed because these came so highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Allison K

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are warm and stretchy and come in several great colors. They even fit my smaller 5'5" 130 pound frame nicely. The problem is that they pill and attract stuff like cat hair like crazy. This means the only way you can wear them is under other pants otherwise they look awful.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: they weren't lined with anything,but maybe that's coincidence
customer_reviews.text: They weren't lined with anything,but they're well made,so I didn't return them,and decided to have well-made but unlined leggings I could wear everyday.I'm not complaining,just mentioning that they're well made and that they happened to send me unlined leggings in packages and had tags.Letting something like that slip by, quality control might not be the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Nickel Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Thick but very poor quality and runs tiny
customer_reviews.text: While they are warm and fleece on inside, the ones I got are tiny. The top waist area is very snug and I’m a size 2. The crotch area will tear after a few uses.... not good quality at all. And like I said, I’m a very small girl. Yes they are thick, but very bad construction
customer_reviews.author: Cali35

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect leggings!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these leggings today and I'm in love with them already!!!! I am 5'1" and weigh 130 pounds. I don't know how they do it but this one size does fit all beautifully. My daughter is 5 foot one and weighs 100 pounds and they fit her beautifully as well. They are the perfect thickness and the softest material I have ever felt in leggings in my life. You can't go wrong with these!!!! I'm going back for more!!!
customer_reviews.author: chattycathy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are sooo comfy! These come in one size and they fit probably best a size 10-16. I usually wear M/L clothes and they are great. However, if you are a smaller person they will probably be little too big. The leggins have a fleece lining and higher waist, which makes them perfect for the colder fall and winter days. They look good to wear outside or at home. These are well made leggings that feel and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Eva_M

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend and she likes them. They do fit a little weird in the crotch as other comments say. And they aren’t the *best* quality but they aren’t bad either. I bought these over a year ago and they’ve held up nicely. She still wears them all the time. For this price it’s a great deal. Can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Definitely warm but...
customer_reviews.text: These aren't exactly plus size. Perhaps XL at best but they're warm, good quality and I use these every Chicago winter. Layer well under jeans, khakis and yoga/knit pants!
customer_reviews.author: ButtaflyPoet

customer_reviews.title: These are great leggings.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought and received these leggings last week. I love them. I'm 5' 5" tall and weigh approximately 160 pounds and they fit perfectly. I'd recommend these to anyone looking for lined leggings for colder weather. The high waistband helps in giving a more slimmer appearance and length is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tarnold

customer_reviews.title: Warm seamless and comfortable, during the extremely cold weather can be used for liners.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, comfortable, breathable ,and affordable thank you Amazon for another great product...I don’t normally purchase clothing thru Amazon, glad I did this time, plus sent a set to California for a Christmas present...my sister love all five colors plus the two pairs of black, put on a pair immediately after opening!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zettie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are very comfortable, I could live in them!. The temperatures here in Montana get very cold so these leggings will be a nice addition under jeans when I am out and about. The colors are just as shown and the fit is perfect, I am 5 foot six and 180 pounds. I would recommend these leggings to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. I gave them a 4 rating because the easily snag and ball up. But for the price and the fact that i only wear them to lounge around the house makes it only a small disappointment. They probably would not hold up to long of you wore them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kresin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings. They are super soft and deffinatley helps keep me warm. I work in cold weather during the winter. I am 5'4 and 150lbs and these fit well. Jeans slide right over these leggings perfectly without bunching up. I swear these ore like the everyone can wear leggings, since I gifted some of it to my mom and they fit her well too. The only thing is I wish the tummy control part was a bit more snug but its the most comfortable band I have ever had with a high waist. The best part about it is it doesn't make your t gifted some of it to my mom and they fit her well too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought the 6 pack. The leggings are very comfortable. Not too thick, definitely long enough so you don't have to do the "legging shuffle" trying to get the crotch up from between the knees without leaving the ankles exposed. I am very pleased with the quality of these leggings and the price I payed for them make the 6 pack an excellent deal. Leggings EVERY DAY.
customer_reviews.author: Alie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Snags and pulls
customer_reviews.text: I like them, they are very comfy, soft, warm...but omg they snag on everything. Seriously, had my laptop sitting on my legs, picked it up and it snagged and pulled. Had a BOTTLE CAP, yes a bottle cap on my knee, it snagged. I like them for just sitting on the couch but doing any type of chores I'm too scared to snag them on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the trio of black, green and grey to try out. I never buy "One Size Fits All" because it tends to never really work out for me. I'm around a size 15/16 in most pants. These leggings fit perfectly. I decided to buy six more! They are nice and warm...the fleece lining on the inside makes a big difference. You can dress up or down with them too.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia4realia

customer_reviews.title: Not for winter
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for thick, winter style leggings these are not it. They do have a soft fleece lining but they're thin. You'll freeze in cold weather. Instead of returning, I decided to wear them at home because they are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Adel mam

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but doesn't fit "all"
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are very soft and super comfy. However, they are a bit large and long on me. I am 5' tall, 120 pounds, with short legs. I'm hoping washing them in hot water and drying on high will shrink them some. Either way I'm keeping them as, being retired, I intend to wear them only around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was already opened and defective product
customer_reviews.text: The plastic packaging was already opened, looks like someone may have returned the leggings previously. The grey leggings had a big snag in them, so they are not wearable. I wasn’t in love with the grey so I decided not to return all the leggings over one pair. Leggings are a little long and thinner than what I wanted, but for the price they are fine for wearing around the house or with a long top. Just disappoint that I was sent a already opened product that was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are very warm, however after one wear they started pilling up and looking worn and cheap. I just wear them around the house anymore, not out like I was hoping to.
customer_reviews.author: Megalito

customer_reviews.title: They come big but workable!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a quick, casual or even dressed up look these tights are perfect. They are one size fits all but they are a little big on me, I weigh 138 but being that they are high waisted I’ve made them work just by folding down once at the waist, works perfectly for me because I always wear long shirts/ sweaters with tights. The look is mega cute.
customer_reviews.author: Chinetta

customer_reviews.title: love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love the material and the fit. Not too tight and very comfortable. They are also slightly thicker than regular leggings and will be great for Winter, Spring and Fall. Great value and will definitely purchase from Dimore again
customer_reviews.author: C Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected. Wouldn’t recommend for petite
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfortable. Had to sew them because they are very large and made my stomach look too big under my dress. Gave a pair to my friend who is about 30 lbs heavier and she loved them
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: the most eh product ever
customer_reviews.text: Nice the first few wears, but holy cow do holes appear in the crotch area like its their job. The elasticity gets wonked out of proportion after a while, the bottoms now sag and don't hug my shins (it's been a year). Most colors are kinda bad - i only wear the black one to be honest. the rest are just unmatchable colors. or i just might be bad at fashion, unsure.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: High waisted but itch after a few washes
customer_reviews.text: Own these for three years now. Pro, they are high waisted and fit over the baby bump. Con, they now make me itch when i first put them on. Fabric color and softness fades. Got what I paid for though, cheap fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal B

customer_reviews.title: Yes, please!
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest leggings I have ever owned! I never want to take them off again. They fit exactly as described and I have received multiple compliments on them with each wear. Highly recommend these...how can you beat this price for such a wonderful product?!
customer_reviews.author: Alwaysshopping

customer_reviews.title: One size fits most for this is a large
customer_reviews.text: The one size fits most is for a like large, I'm a small or medium on a bloated day and these leggings have no structure or tummy control on the high waist. There's alot of material in the leg area so it looks and feels as though I'm swimming in them. I guess they are now only good for sleeping in. As I washed them to see it they would shrink and nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Bear DeCosta

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Leggings are very soft, are high wasted and look great. The issues I have is that when I bend all the way over, the butt becomes somewhat see through (I am 5’5” and 140 lbs). Air dry this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great price for awesome leggings
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are soft, warm and fit quite well for "one size". I am 5'-4" and 140 lbs and they pull on easily and fit well with some room to spare, but no bagging anywhere. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: DonnaK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that these leggings are amazing!! As a 5'3 and 115lb woman, i was hesitant to buy these since a few reviews say they were long and hang past the ankles even for some taller women. But they fit me amazingly, ontop of being warmer than most leggings, and how comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great tights
customer_reviews.text: Love them they are very nice and roomy, I wear a large and they fit great. Not much compression which I wanted, as I already have a lot with compression, these tights are so comfortable! Definitely buy!!’
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: The most glorious thing that I’ve ever worn
customer_reviews.text: The softest warmest most glorious leggings ive ever worn. I will only be wearing these forever. I can’t say how they’ll hold up for the price who cares. I plan to hand wash and hang dry though.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: This is the second set I've ordered
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely amazing. They are thick enough that you can't see your underwear and long enough to cover your ankles even when you sit, they stay tucked inside your Chelsea boots. This is the second set I have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Alana N. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Leggings
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, comfortable, and nice looking. I have worn them with long sweaters, dresses, and cami / cardigan combos. I usually pair them with short or long boots or flats.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: super comfy-great fit-great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great quality, so soft. I can wear these under tunics, as jammies, with boots, etc. So soft and it has a super comfy high waistband. love all the colors for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten tarman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not very wear resistant
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are SO comfortable. I'm 5'5", 120-125 lbs. However, they pill very easily. I wore a pair while cleaning and unpacking after a move and it was pilled to high heaven by the end of the day. So I keep this pair for working around the house and the others for wearing in public.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings but really long 0
customer_reviews.text: Great leggings and great price. Nice thick material giving support. The only problem is you have to be 6 feet tall or pull these up over your nose
customer_reviews.author: Edna Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Know your height
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable & warm. That's the good. The not so good is buying them if you are shorter that 5'4 to 5'6. I'm 5'2, so the waist comes up to the top of my abdomen & the legs go to the middle of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and a nice full leg length! Definitely good for winter and late fall/early spring in northern states. You can wear them under skirts and dresses. These will be too big and long for petite ppl. They are very high waisted on me (140lbs 5'5") but considering the price and that they are one size only, they still work great for my height and up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too loose
customer_reviews.text: I wear sm/med and these are too loose (think 1980"s stretch pants), they fit like a large. If you're a smaller person, look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Warm. Fit well. Quality of seams not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Seeing is not so good though. One pair arrived with a hole in the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime O.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST leggings I have purchased. Thick enough to wear as pants but also thin enough to where under jeans. I live in Alaska so this is great!! I’ve washed them and dried them and they feel the same as when I got them! Highly recommend! Awesome price! I will order in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these! They fit very well. They stay up! The fleece like lining adds a little warmth but is still comfortable indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great fit
customer_reviews.text: I was originally worried that these would be the thin summer weight. But they are a great thickness, and stay up very well. Keeps my legs warm all day.
customer_reviews.author: R. Voss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6 pack and so glad I did! These are comfortable, flattering and great fitting. I had a 9lb baby that left some extra skin around my lower stomach and these hold it in amazing. I'm 5'4 190lbs and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Those are very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend, get them! Great quality and and value! They are thick, well made and the colors are very nice. True to the size. Comfortable and very warm. Great for winter and Fall!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Those these leggings have fleece they are still very thin- you definitely need to wear something to cover them. They are not good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Amy

customer_reviews.title: The comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING. Nice and warm. I work outside in the weather. These are so nice and warm the colors are great for matching many different outfits. So soft and arrived on time. Would recommend to anyone wanting some extra warmth and softness. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: kari vantusko

customer_reviews.title: A decent deal
customer_reviews.text: There are no tags to determine the front from the back. There is a tag in the legs by the ankle but that won't tell you which way to put them on. The material seems to pill slightly so wash them separately. They fit nice and the colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm without bulk
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings. They add warmth without adding bulk. I have worn them comfortably under my jeans or work pants in the winter on the coldest days.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Changed Opinion
customer_reviews.text: I initially reviewed these very highly, they fit great, are comfortable, thickness is wonderful. I can't remember the exact date i received them but its been about 6-8 months that i've had them. Every single pair has torn in the inner seam.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: See through, but cozy for under dresses
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfy these leggings are but they are SUPER see through. When I'm sitting down I can see my thigh tattoo and when standing, can we my underwear. So I don't recommend unless you want them for layering during the winter. I'm wearing them with a dress currently and they look good. Don't anticipate them lasting too long though. I'm 5 ft 2 and weigh 180.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, not too tight on waist
customer_reviews.text: overall pleased with purchase. warm, not too tight in the waist. it is high waisted. gives a nice shape d/t high waist. variety of colors helps. I like it doesn't have a seam going down the middle. I got M/L and the leg is a bit long. would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: haeyoung boonsong

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great value. I am 5’5” and do not have a small waistline, these leggings have a high waist and are super comfortable. There is a little bunch up at the bottom of the leg but very minor. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Little

customer_reviews.title: order a size up
customer_reviews.text: these nice a little tight , not true to size order a extra large the legs were great but the waist was uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: gabi

customer_reviews.title: I like the color combinations of these  fleece leggings
customer_reviews.text: I like the color combinations of these fleece leggings. I can wear different colors every day to match different clothes. They are very flexible, and although I am a bit burly, it is still very comfortable to wear. Fortunately, this high-waist design can keep my abdomen warm, I like it very much. When washed, these leggings did not shrink, and the fleece inside was still soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, generous cut. So Very Warm!!! Exactly as described and pictured. Perfect for pairing with tunic or pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly sewn
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately two out of this pack came with holes because it wasn't sewn properly. I do like the ones that have stayed together but I don't use them much for fear the seams will split.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are easy to wear, comfortable, cozy and good looking. I would recommend them and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: Love these great for the cold weather. Can wear under dresses under pants if needed extra warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Leggings ....Must buy given the price for 6
customer_reviews.text: Loved these leggings.. can’t wait to try them on. True to size ,colors exactly as described... Lost one star from me because one grey one came with pulled thread. Overall I am satisfied..one great thing about these leggings is they come in high waist band..exactly what I wanted which stops leggings from rolling down.. material is fleece which is very warm perfect for fall/winter...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great to wear around town when you have basic errands,like food shopping,going to the gym,or just cleaning the house. They fit I would say up to size 12 easy. And if your talk you will have enough room in the legs. I washed them in cold water and dried them in dryer and had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: dianna

customer_reviews.title: fit nicely and feel good
customer_reviews.text: They fit my legs very well, they're soft and warm, and they look great. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Great colors and definitely my favorite leggings.
customer_reviews.text: These Ditmore fleece lined leggings are super nice and very comfortable. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Goes up to my ankles and it has a high waist he's very soft and comfortable easy to bend and stretch in them I just love them I got 6 pairs for the price well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tessy

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and fit
customer_reviews.text: The best baby for your buck and cozy!!! I will def get another colorful set
customer_reviews.author: KV_DMV

customer_reviews.title: Warming
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you nice and warm during cool breezy days and chili ones so you can still wear a dress or skirt without your legs getting cold or chili.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jennifer Ann Gralinski

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are soft and warm, they feel great and the waist line is super thick and makes you feel secure. Great for wearing under jeans in cold weather or just on their own in warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I did like that they were soft and comfortable. My one issue is that they are not necessarily one-size-fits all. I'm a petite person so they are a bit baggy. Would be nice if they came in various sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha L. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for my size
customer_reviews.text: The colors are as pictured and the texture good but they are too big. The waist hits way above the waist line without hold.
customer_reviews.author: Meally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased these and they are a perfect fit, and very durable
customer_reviews.author: redsoxnation

customer_reviews.title: Love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable leggings. The high waist ensures they don't 'roll' down through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: kktaylor

customer_reviews.title: Kinda warm, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but not as warm as i thought. They did the job as it was warmer than i expected while on my trip. It’s a thin fleece on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: sbeeee

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and chubby so one size fits all normally makes me nervous but these are so comfy and stretched into a perfect fit. In the picture I'm wearing the red ones with my causal witch outfit
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Winter

customer_reviews.title: Staying warm and fuzzy...
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are warm comfortable and pleasing to the eye.... the fabric is weighty without being too heavy they were GREAT for sightseeing in Canada and Alaska (40 degrees) and they will wear well in California’s cold and rainy winter (50’s and windy 60’s) I think I will buy the other colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits MOST, read the description for sizing...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! I wear a size 6/8 depending on brand which is the smallest these fiy and they are a touch too big on the waist but they still stay up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: See through and pills too!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are warm.... but beware! A little bit of stretch = see-through! This means if your undies are patterned and you bend over, it will be obvious. Even the back and navy colors. Also- they seem to pill very easily. Not sure how many wearings you can get out of them before you don’t want to wear them out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are Good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Colors but the color rubbed off on my skin and had a strong smell
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: soft and hold their shape; the waist band is ...
customer_reviews.text: soft and hold their shape; the waist band is wide and offers firm support without constricting. Survived the laundry now several times and no pilling.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Seemed thin at first, but kept me warm!
customer_reviews.text: Used on a trip to Iceland. The material seemed thin upon first glance, but they proved to be very warm & comfy during the trip. Wish we had the option to pick the 6 colors we wanted. The gray & red leggings were unflattering, but other colors were nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are way better than normal leggings because the fleece interior and soft exterior makes them very comfortable and warm to wear. I would highly recommend them. I’m 5’7 and 210lbs and they fit perfectly. So glad I order these leggings.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grace

customer_reviews.title: These arer very stretchy and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I wore them under skirts and they really did the trick. I split these with my mom, I'm 5'7 and I weight about 124 pounds, the overall fit was great, the length was 3 inches above my ankles. As for my mom, she is 5'6 and weight about 120 pounds, the length and fit was perfect for her as well, these are very stretchy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings, super soft, great quality, launders well in a mesh bag do not put it just simply in the wash. They do pill so air dry/line dry only.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. These are a cheap nylon with a inexpensive looking Sheen. The first time I wore them, when I remove them they had pilled Within a 5-hour wear.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Best leggings ever. I hope the smell goes away. It’s got a pretty heavy smell. But so soft and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was really wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The fit great. They are soft and very comfortable. Love these
customer_reviews.author: Eva Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The leggings are a decent quality and fits nicely. They come in variety of color so value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Batul Mundrawal

customer_reviews.title: Love wearing dresses.
customer_reviews.text: Love wearing dresses, but it is quite a problem with winters. So once I found these warm leggings, I decided to give them a try. I am 55kg, 167cm(121lbs,5.5ft) and the size fits me well(still have some room, so they are not very tight). They are ankle-length and have ultra-high rise waist.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Stelzig

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am 115 lbs, 5'5, size 2 pants-- these fit great! Slightly big, but overall pleased with quality! Nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Frances25

product_meta.title: Dimore Women's Fleece Lined Leggings High Waist Soft Warm Winter Pants Slim for Women One Size
feature_bullets: Premium Stretch Fabric - 92% Polyester 8% Spandex - Hand Wash Cold or Hang Dry Only, Don¡¯t Bleach
ONE SIZE - Fits most sizes and body types.If you wear a size M-XL, these leggings are a good choice.

COMFORT & WARMTH - The leggings for women are soft and flexible. The super soft fleece lining and high waist design provide just the right amount of warmth, this slim fit leggings keep you warm and stylish at the same time.They have a good elasticity,so they will not fall down and will make you comfortable.

APPLICATION - The winter leggings can be used for any occasions. They also can be dressed in Spring, Autumn and Winter.The lined leggings are suitable for daily wear, stage shows and working. Pair them with a fitted top and a blazer to work,or you can match beautiful dresses , long shirts, skirts and fun boots when you go out.They are also a great Christmas gift for your friends ,sisters,wife,grandmother etc.
